schools.name: University of Science and Technology of Southern Philippines
schools.description: USTP has different campuses consisting of Alubijid, CDO, Claveria, and many more. The university offers various courses, including BS in Information Technology and BS in Technology Communication and Management.

topics.topicdescription: Java is a high-level, class-based, object-oriented programming language. Developers use Java to construct applications in laptops, data centres, game consoles, scientific supercomputers, cell phones, and other devices.
Python is a high-level, versatile programming language known for readability and simplicity, facilitating rapid development across various domains.

courses.course: BS in Technology Communication and Management

topics.topicdescription: Understanding communication protocols is crucial in networking. It involves the rules and conventions for communication between network devices.

topics.topicname: Strategic IT Leadership: Managing Teams in the Digital Age
topics.topicdescription: Developing strategic leadership skills for managing teams in the rapidly evolving digital age.
topics.littleinformation: Understanding strategic IT leadership in the digital age.

schools.name: Capitol University
schools.description: Capitol University is a non-sectarian, co-educational private university located in Cagayan de Oro, Philippines. The university offers courses such as Bachelor of Elementary Education and Bachelor of Science in Civil Engineering.

topics.topicdescription: Exploring effective teaching strategies for elementary education, focusing on creating engaging and impactful learning experiences.
topics.littleinformation: Developing effective teaching strategies for elementary education.

topics.topicdescription: Understanding the psychological development of children, exploring key theories and practical applications.
topics.littleinformation: Exploring child psychology for effective teaching.

courses.course: Bachelor of Science in Civil Engineering

topics.topicdescription: Studying the principles and practices of structural engineering, focusing on the design and analysis of structures.
topics.littleinformation: Exploring principles and practices of structural engineering.

topics.topicdescription: Understanding the management aspects of construction projects, including planning, scheduling, and resource allocation.
topics.littleinformation: Exploring construction management in civil engineering.

schools.name: Cagayan de Oro College
schools.description: Cagayan de Oro College is a private non-sectarian college on Max Suniel St, Carmen, Cagayan de Oro, Philippines. The college offers courses such as BS in Criminology and BS in Nursing.

topics.topicdescription: Studying the fundamental principles and statutes of criminal law, exploring the legal aspects of criminal activities and justice.
topics.littleinformation: Exploring fundamental principles and statutes of criminal law.

topics.topicdescription: Understanding the application of scientific techniques in investigating crimes, including the collection and analysis of evidence.
Developing skills in assessing the health status of individuals, including physical examinations and health history interviews.
topics.littleinformation: Developing skills in health assessment for nursing practice.

topics.topicdescription: Studying the principles of drug action, including drug interactions, side effects, and dosage calculations.

schools.name: Xavier University - Ateneo de Cagayan
schools.description: Xavier University is a private Catholic university run by the Society of Jesus in Cagayan de Oro City. The university offers a wide range of programs, including BS in Computer Science and BS in Environmental Science.

topics.topicdescription: Understanding the fundamental concepts of data structures and algorithms, crucial for efficient software development.
topics.littleinformation: Exploring data structures and algorithms for software development.

topics.topicdescription: Developing skills in designing and building interactive and user-friendly websites and web applications.
topics.littleinformation: Learning web development for creating interactive websites.

topics.topicdescription: Studying strategies and practices for the conservation and sustainable use of natural resources and ecosystems.
topics.littleinformation: Exploring environmental conservation for sustainable practices.

topics.topicdescription: Understanding the impacts of climate change and developing adaptive strategies for mitigating its effects.
topics.littleinformation: Developing strategies for climate change adaptation.
